discovery_rule.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME database tables discovery
discovery_rule.description: PostgreSQL tables discovery. Use regular expressions to configure search. Disabled by default because may add too many items.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} indexes size
item_prototype.description: PostgreSQL all indexes size which belongs to a single table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} size
item_prototype.description: PostgreSQL single table size.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: analyzes
item_prototype.description: Number of analyze operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: autoanalyzes
item_prototype.description: Number of autoanalyze operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: autovacuums
item_prototype.description: Number of autovacuum operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: cache blocks hits per second
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in this table

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: cache blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: index blocks hit per second
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in all indexes on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: index blocks read per second
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from all indexes on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: index scans
item_prototype.description: Number of index scans initiated on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: tuples read per second by index scans
item_prototype.description: Number of live rows fetched by index scans.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: dead rows
item_prototype.description: Estimated number of dead rows.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: live rows
item_prototype.description: Estimated number of live rows.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows deleted per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows deleted.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows HOT updated per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required).

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows inserted per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows inserted.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: rows updated per second
item_prototype.description: Number of rows updated.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: sequential scans
item_prototype.description: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: tuples read per second by sequential scans
item_prototype.description: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks hits per second from TOAST indexes
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table index (if any).

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks read per second from TOAST indexes
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table index (if any).

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks hits per second from TOAST
item_prototype.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table (if any).

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: disk blocks read per second from TOAST
item_prototype.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table (if any).

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} stat: vacuums
item_prototype.description: Number of vacuum operations performed on this table.

item_prototype.name: PostgreSQL: DATABASENAME: table {#TABLENAME} rows count
item_prototype.description: PostgreSQL single table rows count.
